column3: is meeting with his group on a yacht. He/she decides to use to yachts to protect him/herself. From the port, one goes to 70 degrees west of south; another one goes to 50 degrees east of south. The models suggest the west one travels 14 km per hour while the east one travels 16 km per hour. After 30 minutes, both yachts stop. The SCCI HD surveillance can only focus on a radius of 14 km. Can you monitor both? If you can, then ask the Sector for help.=2=true=15=1=You successfully know that the POI is a potential victim as the other party threats him with his wife and daughter.=1<You lose a excellent opportunity to get what
